Comment: A unique ID number for the timesheet line.
The ID number of the staff member on the timesheet line.
The ID number of the job that the line relates to.
The title of the job that the line relates to.
The stockcode of the labour pay item for this line.
The description of the labour pay item for this line.
The start date of the week that times are being entered for.
The number of hours entered for day 1.

If a narrative has been entered for the day, its ID number is recorded here.
